actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The scout makes two Shortsword or Shortbow attacks.

actions.name: Shortsword
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 5 (1d6+2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Shortbow
actions.desc: _Ranged Weapon Attack:_ +4 to hit, ranged 80/320 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 5 (1d6+2) piercing damage.

bonus_actions.name: Escape to Report
bonus_actions.desc: The scout takes the Dash or Disengage action.

special_abilities.name: Heightened Hearing and Sight
special_abilities.desc: The scout's Perception is 18 when perceiving by hearing or sight.
